creator: Alexander Terp
title: RAD-374: 'catch' error integration with http functions?
description:
easiest approach

```
http_get(url, error_if_no_success=true) catch:
  // blah blah
```

Not super clean though. Also, we still want the response. Could add another function?

```
resp = http_get(url)
check_error(resp) catch:
  // blah blah
```

^ where that `check_error` will return an `error` if the input is a non-success http response, triggering the attached error block
